unnormalised: Arre bhai, mhaka Jaipurak je train asaa tachem PNR no. harovla, konn makaad madat korunk xaktaa? Tem Rakesh Sharma hachea naavan book kelam, confirm ticket aslem, punn SMS mellonaa!
normalised: Arre bhai, mhaka Jaipurak vochche trendacho P-N-R number haravla, konn mhaka adar kortolo? To Rakesh Sharma hachea nanvan book kela, confirm ticket asa, punn S-M-S mellona!
text: Arre bhai, mhaka Jaipurak je train asaa tachem PNR no. harovla, konn makaad madat korunk xaktaa? Tem Rakesh Sharma hachea naavan book kelam, confirm ticket aslem, punn SMS mellonaa!
